variants.headline: MINDFUL MORNINGS
variants.body: Scene: Waking up in a high-tech, futuristic bedroom, surrounded by neon lights and holographic projections
variants.visualDescription: Soft, warm lighting with a slightly tilted camera angle, emphasizing the futuristic elements
variants.rationale: NeuralLink Headset is worn on the head, controlling the ambiance and entertainment | Serenity and focus

variants.headline: SOCIAL SYNAPSE
variants.body: Scene: Attending a virtual reality music festival, surrounded by friends and strangers
variants.visualDescription: Vibrant, dynamic lighting with fast-paced camera cuts, capturing the energy of the festival
variants.rationale: NeuralLink Headset enables seamless social interactions and immersive entertainment | Excitement and belonging

variants.headline: LIMITLESS LEARNING
variants.body: Scene: Exploring a virtual reality museum, interacting with exhibits and learning about art and history
variants.visualDescription: Soft, natural lighting with a steady camera pan, emphasizing the educational aspects
variants.rationale: NeuralLink Headset provides an immersive and interactive learning experience | Curiosity and wonder

variants.headline: INNOVATION STATION
variants.body: Scene: Working in a futuristic laboratory, collaborating with colleagues and creating innovative solutions
variants.visualDescription: Bright, clinical lighting with a bird's-eye view camera angle, emphasizing the scientific aspects
variants.rationale: NeuralLink Headset enables cutting-edge research and development | Inspiration and creativity

variants.headline: NEURONIRVANA
variants.body: Scene: Practicing meditation and mindfulness in a peaceful, virtual environment
variants.visualDescription: Soft, ethereal lighting with a slow, zooming camera motion, emphasizing the meditative state
variants.rationale: NeuralLink Headset provides a deep sense of relaxation and mental clarity | Tranquility and self-awareness
